articles.title: Android 16 review: Post-hype - Ars Technica
articles.description: The age of big, exciting Android updates is probably over.

articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: OpenAI reportedly ‘recalibrating’ compensation in response to Meta hires - TechCrunch
articles.description: With Meta successfully poaching a number of its senior researchers, an OpenAI executive reportedly reassured team members Saturday that company leadership has not “been standing idly by.”
articles.content:

articles.title: A neural brain implant provides near instantaneous speech - Ars Technica
articles.description: Focusing on sound production instead of word choice makes for a flexible system.
